remarks: Lemma for ~ fsumre , ~ fsumim , and ~ fsumcj .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
fsumre.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumre.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumrelem.3 $e |- F : CC --> CC $.
fsumrelem.4 $e |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( F ` ( x + y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) + ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
fsumrelem $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( F ` B ) ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F k x y $.
$d k ph x y $.
